feed.title: Flog
feed.subtitle: Adam Burmister, Web Superhero in Training

entry.title: The Deemed Contract Business Model
entry.summary: Since dipping my toes into the entrepreneurial puddle I’ve found myself fascinated by business models. A startup, is at it’s core, the search for a sustainable business model. The stuff around it - the technology, the value proposition, customer segments - are all just there to support that core search.
entry.content:
Since dipping my toes into the entrepreneurial puddle I’ve found myself fascinated by business models. A startup, is at it’s core, the search for a sustainable business model. The stuff around it - the technology, the value proposition, customer segments - are all just there to support that core search.
